properties.name: Adams St Graveyard
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan Primrose Rd. South Bend, In 46637Adams St. Graveyard: Reported on the local news as a haunted spot during the Halloween season, this cemetery has graves dating back to the late 1700s. Mists have appeared in photos along with orbs and odd sounds recorded.

properties.name: Central High School
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan 620 West Colfax B South Bend, In 46601Old Central High School: After this school was closed it was purchased and turned into an apartment complex. The new owners have not opened the old auditorium because of the paranormal activity in that part of the building.

properties.name: Haunted Bridge
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan Haunted Bridge: An Engineer for the railroad was rumored to have committed suicide by jumping off the bridge over Juday Creek. If you follow the trail to the bridge you will see the engineer with a lantern standing on the bridge.

properties.name: Old Cleveland Road
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan Old Cleveland Road South Bend, In Primrose Road and Old Cleveland Road: Red eyes seem to be watching from the nearby woods, the sound of horses moving around and the possible reenactment of an occult ritual involving a human sacrifice. Local legend is that you will feel intense sadness near the lake that is overpowering.

properties.name: Oliver Mansion
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan 808 W Washington St South Bend, In 46601Oliver Mansion: Staff at the Northern Indiana Center for History have great stories about the spirit haunting this mansion. Her name is Katherine Oliver.

properties.name: Potato Creek State Park
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan 25601 St. Rd. 4 P.O. Box 908 North Liberty 46554Potato Creek State Park: Rumored to be haunted by the spirit or spirits of children who have lost their life while swimming at the beach over the years. Fishermen have reported the sounds of a child or children calling for help and calling mommy but, when they leave their fishing to go to the beach area it is deserted.

properties.name: Primrose Road
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan Primrose Road, South BendPrimrose Road: The story is that if you drive on this road at less than 20mph your tires will be slashed by an unseen entity but, if you go above 30mph your car will die and you will be unable to restart it. If you leave your car and walk down Primrose you may hear voices or see spirits warning you of danger and that you must return to your car now. There is also supposed to be an old haunted farmhouse that may appear out of nothing. If you walk to the door and knock it may be answered by an old woman in a white gown/nightgown. If she invites you inside your luck will be good but, if she shuts the door on you then your luck will be bad.

properties.name: Saint Mary's College- Le Mans Hall Bell Tower
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan Notre Dame, InSt. Mary\'s College - Le Mans Hall Bell Tower: The spirit of a girl who committed suicide by hanging has been seen in this tower. There are also reports of Blood spots on the floor of the 4th Floor Infirmary which appear at random.

properties.name: Sycamore Road
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan South BendSycamore Road: Also known as Old Roller Coaster Road, the rumors are that if you are on this road you will be chased by a phantom car.

properties.name: Tippecanoe Place Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Kkrzyzan 620 W Washington St. South Bend, In 46601Tippecanoe Place Restaurant: This mansion was once the home of Clement Studebaker (One of the brothers in the Studebake empire). In the early 1900s a fire in the nursery left one of his children and the nanny horribly burned. Clement hung himself after the Studebaker Empire crumbled. There are rumors that he did this in the mansion but, other rumors persist that it was elsewhere. The mansion is now a restaurant and bar. Strange things have been seen and heard by both employees and patrons of the restaurant. The bar is located where the nursery was. Liquor bottle have flown off the shelf to break on the floor several feet away, cold spots, seeing movement out of the corner of their eye along with assorted unexplained noises. The top floor is a ballroom which has been used for dances. There seems to be more activity in this area than in any other in the mansion.
